LanguageData.SY_CA.TooltipCarryingCapacity: Set the carrying capacity for this animal Carrying capacity defines the size of items an animal can carry when hauling Will not affect mass capacity for caravans unless the setting for it is enabled under global settings
LanguageData.SY_CA.TooltipMinCarryingCapacity: Set a minimum carrying capacity modifier for all animals Actual carrying capacity depends on body size and the manipulation stat Will not affect mass capacity for caravans unless the setting for it is enabled under global settings
LanguageData.SY_CA.TooltipMaxCarryingCapacity: Set a maximum carrying capacity modifier for all animals Actual carrying capacity depends on body size and the manipulation stat Will not affect mass capacity for caravans unless the setting for it is enabled under global settings
LanguageData.SY_CA.TooltipAffectsMassCapacity: Make carrying capacity affect caravan mass capacity for all animals Base carrying capacity value for animals is 75, higher increases the mass that can be carried, lower will decreases it (This only matters for pack animals)
